languages.text: "Против... кого угодно. Это абсолютная мощь. Первые эксперименты с данной техносвятыней были всеразрушительными. Техночума... Лишь его эхо. Потенциал был гораздо больше". {n}Техножрица умолкает, будто напуганная собственными словами.{/n} "Ему не стоило попадать в руки мирян, но Лорд-инквизитор украл его. Секрет был добыт за пространственными вратами, под темными звездами, и передан Амарнату. Калькасар низверг Мессию Прерывания и ограбил. Забрал секрет себе".

"Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."
languages.original_text: "Против... кого угодно. Это абсолютная мощь. Первые эксперименты с данной техносвятыней были всеразрушительными. Техночума... Лишь его эхо. Потенциал был гораздо больше". {n}Техножрица умолкает, будто напуганная собственными словами.{/n} "Ему не стоило попадать в руки мирян, но Лорд-инквизитор украл его. languages.text: “用来对付……所有人，它拥有着绝对的力量。对这件科技遗物的首次实验，就造成了灾难性的后果。技术枯萎症……仅仅是它的回响而已，它原本的力量要强大得多。”{n}她顿了顿，仿佛是被自己的话吓了一跳。{/n}“它本不该落在教外人士手中，但大审判官夺走了它。它的秘密是在次元之门以外的黑暗星空下揭晓的，传给了阿玛纳特。卡尔卡扎摧毁了终结的弥赛亚，夺走了它身上的秘密，将其据为己有。”
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."

traits.locale_text: “用来对付……所有人，它拥有着绝对的力量。对这件科技遗物的首次实验，就造成了灾难性的后果。技术枯萎症……仅仅是它的回响而已，它原本的力量要强大得多。”{n}她顿了顿，仿佛是被自己的话吓了一跳。{/n}“它本不该落在教外人士手中，但审判长夺走了它。它的秘密是在次元之门以外的黑暗星空下揭晓的，传给了阿玛纳特。卡尔卡扎摧毁了终结的弥赛亚，夺走了它身上的秘密，将其据为己有。”
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: « Contre... n'importe qui. Son pouvoir est absolu. Les premières expériences avec cette technorelique ont tourné à la catastrophe. La technopeste... n'en est que l'écho. Son potentiel est bien plus grand. » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant, comme si ses propres mots l'effrayaient.{/n} « Elle n'aurait jamais dû tomber entre les mains des profanes, mais le seigneur inquisiteur l'a volée. Son secret a été découvert au-delà de la porte dimensionnelle, sous les étoiles noires, avant d'entrer en possession d'Amarnat. Alors, Calcazar a détruit le Messie de l'Interruption et l'a détroussé, puis il s'est approprié ce secret. »
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."

traits.locale_text: « Contre... n'importe qui. Son pouvoir est absolu. Les premières expériences avec cette technorelique ont tourné à la catastrophe. La technopeste... n'en est que l'écho. Son potentiel est bien plus grand. » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant, comme si ses propres mots l'effrayaient.{/n} « Elle n'aurait jamais dû tomber entre les mains des profanes, mais le seigneur inquisiteur l'a volée. Son secret a été découvert au-delà de la porte dimensionnelle, sous les étoiles noires, avant d'entrer en possession d'Amarnat. Alors, Calcazar a détruit le Messie de l'Interruption et l'a détroussé, puis il s'est approprié ce secret. »
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: 「すべての者に対してよ…あれは絶大な力を持っている。この技術遺物の最初の実験は悲惨なものだった。技術疾病は…その反響に過ぎない。遥かに大きい潜在能力はを抱えているわ」{n}自分の言葉に怯えたように、彼女は口をつぐんだ。{/n}「俗人の手に渡るはずのないものだったのに、ロード・インクィジターが盗み出した。その秘密は次元の門を越え、暗黒の星の下で調達され、アマルナトに渡った。カルカサルは廃絶の救世主を滅ぼし、強奪した。そしてその秘密を自分のものとした」
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての者に対してよ…あれは絶大な力を持っている。この技術遺物の最初の実験は悲惨なものだった。技術疾病は…その反響に過ぎない。遥かに大きい潜在能力はを抱えているわ」{n}自分の言葉に怯えたように、彼女は口をつぐんだ。{/n}「俗人の手に渡るはずのないものだったのに、ロード・インクィジターが盗み出した。その秘密は次元の門を越え、暗黒の星の下で調達され、アマルナトに渡った。カルカサルは廃絶の救世主を滅ぼし、強奪した。そしてその秘密を自分のものとした」
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: «Contra... nadie. Su poder es absoluto. Los primeros experimentos con aquella tecnoreliquia resultaron en tragedia. La tecnoplaga... no es más que su eco. Alberga un potencial mucho mayor». {n}Se detiene como si sintiera miedo por sus propias palabras.{/n} «Nunca debió de caer en manos de los laicos, pero el Lord Inquisidor la robó. Su secreto traspasó el portal dimensional, transitó por debajo de las estrellas oscuras y llegó a Amarnat. Calcazar destruyó al Mesías de la Discontinuidad y le quitó cuanto guardaba. El secreto pasó a ser suyo».
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."

traits.locale_text: «Contra... nadie. Su poder es absoluto. Los primeros experimentos con aquella tecnoreliquia resultaron en tragedia. La tecnoplaga... no es más que su eco. Alberga un potencial mucho mayor». {n}Se detiene como si sintiera miedo por sus propias palabras.{/n} «Nunca debió de caer en manos de los laicos, pero el Lord Inquisidor la robó. Su secreto traspasó el portal dimensional, transitó por debajo de las estrellas oscuras y llegó a Amarnat. Calcazar destruyó al Mesías de la Discontinuidad y le quitó cuanto guardaba. El secreto pasó a ser suyo».
traits.speaker: DoorLockerTechpriest1

languages.text: "Gegen ... jeden. Ihre Macht ist absolut. Die ersten Experimente mit diesem Tech-Relikt waren katastrophal. Die Tech-Seuche ... ist lediglich das Echo. Ihr Potenzial ist so viel größer." {n}Sie hält inne, als würden ihre eigenen Worte ihr Angst machen.{/n} "Sie hätte niemals in die Hände des Laienstands fallen dürfen, doch der Großinquisitor hat sie gestohlen. Ihr Geheimnis wurde von jenseits des Dimensionstors beschafft, unter den dunklen Sternen, und an Amarnat weitergegeben. Calcazar hat den Messias der Unterbrechung vernichtet und ihn beraubt. Und das Geheimnis für sich selbst gefordert."
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. Ihr Geheimnis wurde von jenseits des Dimensionstors beschafft, unter den dunklen Sternen, und an Amarnat weitergegeben. Calcazar hat den Messias der Unterbrechung vernichtet und ihn beraubt. Und das Geheimnis für sich selbst gefordert."

languages.text: "Herkese... Karşı. Bu silah mutlaktır. Bu tekno yadigârla yapılan ilk deneyler felaketle sonuçlandı. Tekno afeti... Yalnızca bir yankıdan ibaret. Potansiyeli, aklın mantığın ötesinde." {n}Kendi kelimelerinden dolayı dehşete kapılmışçasına duraksıyor.{/n} "Avamın eline düşmemesi gerekirken Lord Engizisyoncu onu çaldı. Sırrı, karanlık yıldızların altında boyutsal geçidin ötesine ulaştı ve Amarnat'a geçti. Calcazar, Bozulum Mesihi'ni yok edip onu gasbetti, kendi çıkarları için bu sırra sahip oldu."
languages.original_text: "Against... anyone. Its power is absolute. The first experiments with this tech-relic were calamitous. The tech-blight... is merely its echo. Its potential is so much greater." {n}She stops, as if frightened by her own words.{/n} "It never should have fallen into the hands of the laity, but the Lord Inquisitor stole it. Its secret was procured beyond the dimensional gate, beneath the dark stars, and passed over to Amarnat. Calcazar destroyed the Messiah of Discontinuing and robbed him. And claimed the secret for himself."
